Have a delicious meal of tasty vegetarian food

We are committed to serving fresh and tasty Indian cuisine with as many locally sourced ingredients as possible. We strive for authenticity with most recipes being passed down through generations of Indian families. We also strive to leave little impact on the environment by using most of our profits to support local climate organizations and charities.

WE OFFER DINE-INBOTH AND CARRYOUT
